title: Detached Garages Available, Private Fenced Yard *
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 729 Sq.
Copper Terrace offers sleek and stylish apartment homes for lease in the heart of the Denver Tech Center.
Enjoy easy access to modern amenities right outside your door, and the ideal location in Centennial, CO, our residents have everything they need nearby.

Our newly-renovated apartment homes, located in the desirable Cherry Creek School District, deliver a relaxing sanctuary each and every day while keeping you close to the DTC and minutes from downtown Denver.
Schedule your personal tour of Copper Terrace apartments today.
- One-, Two-, and Three- Bedroom Residences
- Located in the Highly-Rated Cherry Creek School District
- Modern Clubhouse with Wi-Fi Access in Common Areas
- Conveniently Located Near Denver Tech Center
- Outdoor Lounge Area with Fire Pit
- Easy access to Light Rail and I-25 Freeway
We allow 2 pets per apartment home.
Pet Fee $200.00 non-refundable (per pet), Pet Deposit: $200.00 refundable (per pet), & Pet Rent $35.00 per month/per pet.
